title: Introducing the Eucalypts
creator_credit: Paul Broady and Video Education Australia
brief_description: This program covers the main features of our Eucalypts: their identifying characteristics (especially the bark, flower buds and leaves), adaptability, distribution patterns, growth and type of timber produced, and their human and non-human uses.
